VEF is the former currency of Venezuela, which was replaced by the Bolívar Soberano (VES) in 2018.|VEF
XOF is the currency code for West African CFA franc. Valid translations are: XOF|franco CFA de África Occidental|franco CFA|francos CFA de África Occidental|francos CFA.|XOF
BEF was the currency of Belgium until 2002, when it was replaced by the euro. Therefore, it is not a valid currency anymore.|BEF
